title: How to Make Figgy Duff

steps.headline: Soak the bread crumbs with water for a couple of minutes.
steps.description: Gently squeeze out the water after soaking.

steps.headline: In a bowl, mix together the bread crumbs, brown sugar, ginger, allspice and cinnamon with a fork.
Pour the hot water over the baking soda.
Add the molasses, melted butter and baking soda to the crumb and spice mixture.
Combine all of this with flour and mix well.
Pour the mixture into the large, greased tomato can, cover the top with foil and secure the foil with an elastic band.
Place the can into a large pot with enough boiling water to come up ¾ the height of the tomato can.
Steam for 1½ hours until the duff looks firm.

text: Soak the bread crumbs with water for a couple of minutes. Gently squeeze out the water after soaking. In a bowl, mix together the bread crumbs, brown sugar, ginger, allspice and cinnamon with a fork.  Pour the hot water over the baking soda.  Melt the butter.  Add the molasses, melted butter and baking soda to the crumb and spice mixture.  Combine all of this with flour and mix well.  Pour the mixture into the large, greased tomato can, cover the top with foil and secure the foil with an elastic band.  Place the can into a large pot with enough boiling water to come up ¾ the height of the tomato can.  Steam for 1½ hours until the duff looks firm.  Finished.
